name: Sudd City Adventures (itch)
description:
Sudd City Adventures is a lighthearted point-and-click 2D narrative game set in a world of ordinary superheroes.

Silvia is an FBI Special Agent with friends who happen to be superheroes experiencing minor inconveniences while not fighting crime. Their Very Important Problems include a missing skull ring, escaped reptiles, couch entrapment, and more. Can Silvia help the squad with all their personal crises?

Features:

  • Interview suspects  Talk to friends
  • Find Clues - or just silently judge decorations
  • A short game for busy heroes

Each purchase includes a steam key.

Coming April 7th 2020. 

Follow us on twitter for more news about the game when it releases.
